procedure.title: HIS-43 - Managed services to deliver a survey solution for the National Care Experience Programme (NCEP)
procedure.description:
**Title: HIS-43 - Managed Services to Deliver a Survey Solution for the National Care Experience Programme (NCEP)**

**Description:**
The Health Information and Quality Authority (HIQA) is seeking a reliable and efficient provider to deliver a managed survey solution for the National Care Experience Programme (NCEP). HIQA is an independent statutory authority responsible for promoting safety and quality in the provision of health and social care services in Ireland. As part of its mission to improve health and social care services, HIQA aims to gather comprehensive data through the NCEP to inform decision-making and enhance the quality of care.

**Key Requirements:**
- **Survey Solution:** The bidder must provide a robust and user-friendly survey solution that can be easily integrated into HIQA's existing systems.
- **Data Management:** The solution should ensure secure and efficient data collection, storage, and analysis.
- **User Experience:** The survey tool should be designed to provide a seamless experience for participants, ensuring high response rates and accurate data.
- **Customization:** The bidder must be able to customize the survey solution to meet the specific needs of the NCEP, including the ability to add or modify questions as required.
- **Technical Support:** The provider should offer comprehensive technical support to ensure that the survey solution operates smoothly and addresses any technical issues promptly.
- **Compliance:** The bidder must ensure that the survey solution complies with all relevant data protection regulations, including GDPR.
- **Reporting:** The solution should provide detailed and actionable reports that can be easily interpreted by HIQA's stakeholders.
- **Integration:** The survey tool should be able to integrate with existing HIQA systems and tools to ensure seamless data flow.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
HIQA will evaluate proposals based on the following criteria:
1. **Technical Capability:** The bidder's ability to deliver a technically sound and reliable survey solution.
2. **User Experience:** The ease of use and participant experience of the survey tool.
3. **Customization:** The bidder's ability to customize the survey solution to meet HIQA's specific needs.
4. **Data Security:** The measures in place to ensure the security and integrity of collected data.
5. **Technical Support:** The level of technical support provided, including response times and availability.
6. **Compliance:** The bidder's ability to ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations.
7. **Reporting:** The quality and usability of the reports generated by the survey solution.

**Submission Requirements:**
Proposals should include detailed information on the bidder's experience in delivering similar survey solutions, their technical capabilities, and any relevant case studies. The proposal should also outline the bidder's approach to customization, data security, and technical support. A comprehensive project plan, including timelines and milestones, should be included. All submissions should be made in accordance with the guidelines outlined in the tender documents available on HIQA's website.

By selecting a suitable bidder, HIQA aims to enhance the quality of care by gathering accurate and comprehensive data through the NCEP, thereby supporting informed decision-making and continuous improvement in health and social care services in Ireland.

lots.title: HIS-43 - Managed services to deliver a survey solution for the National Care Experience Programme (NCEP)
lots.description: Provision of Managed services to deliver a survey solution for the National Care Experience Programme. See tender documents for further information.
